name: We Magnets Two
description:
A force to be reckoned with, this pole couple is destined to roam the electromagnetic fields of a mysterious machinery for all eternity. Together they create a magnetic field to keep this humming and drumming room alive. Join the electromagnetic force and keep the machine alive for as long as you can.

A game created in 48 hours during Global Game Jam!

Credits and huge thanks to: 

Trym Ulven Stensvold @Norrun / programming
Trygve Igesund / programming
Ole Torstein Hovig / SFX
Erlend Furholt Moen / Music
Guilherme Ferreira Filipe / 3D-modelling 
Scruffy80 / 3D-modelling (magnets)
Kim Baumann Larsen @kimblarsen/ 3D-modelling, level mock-up

Me: Concept, game design, level design, 2D art & 3D-modelling.
